page.title: 05Social Concerns
page.content:
Social Concerns
Ilford should worry about vandalism, the elderly, pollution and buildings. Vandalism is a problem in Ilford. Shops and small businesses are burgled quite frequently. An increase in muggings is also causing concern, as is graffiti and damage to property. Ilford is a busy town and pollution from smoke causes problems. There is a lot of litter in Ilford but our dustmen do a very good job in clearing it. More hospitals, fire and police stations are needed, as are toilets for the disabled. We trust that during the redevelopment, ramps will be included to allow people in wheelchairs to enter buildings and cross roads more easily.Better traffic signals are needed to help the blind person cross more easily.
